backlog.title: Complete uncommitted React ES modules changes
backlog.description: Uncommitted changes exist for React ES modules support in JestRunner.ts, PROJECT_CONTEXT.md, and production-validation-cicd.md. These changes need to be reviewed, tested, and committed.

backlog.title: React ES Modules JSX Support (REACT-ESM-001)
backlog.description: React ES modules projects with JSX cannot execute tests due to transformation issues. Need to implement proper JSX transformation for ES modules, support React testing with native ES modules, fix React ES modules test execution in validation projects, ensure jsdom environment works with ES modules, and document React ES modules configuration requirements.

backlog.title: Refactor Heartbeat Monitoring Tests (TEST-TIMEOUT-001)
backlog.description: Heartbeat monitoring tests are disabled due to timer handling issues with Jest. Need to refactor tests to use proper mocking, fix timer coordination issues with Jest fake timers, and re-enable all heartbeat monitoring test files to ensure they pass without timeouts.
